Package EnvironmentAPI

Class SensorEnvironment

java.lang.Object
EnvironmentAPI.SensorEnvironment
public class SensorEnvironment
extends java.lang.Object
Class representing a SensorEnvironment, this is a environment that is defined by the values the sensors measure, this is an estimate the sensors can make by working together.
Author:
Yentl.kinoo@student.kuleuven.be

    • getDataBetweenPoints

      public double getDataBetweenPoints​(org.jxmapviewer.viewer.GeoPosition begin, org.jxmapviewer.viewer.GeoPosition end, double interpollationDistance)
      Gets the average pollution between 2 points on the map, with a given interpollation value.
      Parameters:
      begin - first point
      end - second point
      interpollationDistance - distance between segments to calculate pollution from
      Returns:
      an average value of the pollution between the two points.

    • getDataBetweenPointsFromTime

      public double getDataBetweenPointsFromTime​(org.jxmapviewer.viewer.GeoPosition begin, org.jxmapviewer.viewer.GeoPosition end, long startTime, long endTime, double velocity, double interpollationDistance)

    • getDataFromSensors

      public double getDataFromSensors​(SensorEnvironment environment, org.jxmapviewer.viewer.GeoPosition position, long lastTime, long timeInMs)
      Method to get pollution at a certain moment in time, only useful if you need information about the future! Otherwise use the normal function
      Parameters:
      position - The position of which the pollution needs to be found
      timeInMs - The time of which the pollution needs to be found
      Returns:
      the pollution at the given time and position.

    • getMaxOfSensors

      public double getMaxOfSensors()
      Return the maximum value of all sensors, the guessed pollution is determined by the max of these sensors.
      Returns:
      the maximum of all sensors.

    • getDataFromSensors

      public double getDataFromSensors​(org.jxmapviewer.viewer.GeoPosition position)
      Gets the data at a given position at the current time (read current instance of pollutionenv)
      Parameters:
      position - the position to get the pollution from
      Returns:
      pollution at the current time.

    • getDataFromSensorsForTime

      public double getDataFromSensorsForTime​(org.jxmapviewer.viewer.GeoPosition position, long timeinSec)
